inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: known history of sickle cell disease

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 10 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent/assent has been obtained
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient must present to the ED/EC or other appropriate unit in VOC
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe bone pain, severe pain in his lower back

inclusion.criterion: Patient has a diagnosis of SCD (known SS, S-Beta-thalassemia or other hemoglobinopathies causing sickle cell disease)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: known history of sickle cell disease

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to therapeutic nitric oxide within the past 12 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has received sildenafil or other phosphodiesterase 5 inhibitors, therapeutic L-arginine, nitroprusside or nitroglycerine within the past 12 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has visited the ED/EC or other appropriate unit greater than 10 times in the past year having a vaso-occlusive crisis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old African American man with known history of Sickle cell disease. He has had severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs scored 9 out of 10 and has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
